fun.connor.lighter.handler

Interface Request

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestRequest, UndertowRequest

    public interface Request
    An HTTP request. Lighter backend implementations should provide an implementation of this interface. Implementations of this interface need not be thread safe (unless required by the Lighter backend). For optimization, backends can choose to lazily or eagerly load data for this interface. Applications should not be expected to interact with implementations of this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the entire request body as a String.

      Get the IANA Media type for this request if it is present.

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaderValue

        java.lang.String getHeaderValue(java.lang.String header)
        Get an HTTP header from the request
        Parameters:
        header - the header name to read
        Returns:
        The first header value as a string or null if the header is not present

      • getHeaderValues

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHeaderValues(java.lang.String header)
        Get an HTTP header from the request
        Parameters:
        header - the header name to read
        Returns:
        The header values as a string or null if the header is not present

      • getContentType

        java.lang.String getContentType()
        Get the IANA Media type for this request if it is present.
        Returns:
        the IANA Media type as a string or null if there is none

      • getRequestPath

        java.lang.String getRequestPath()
        The path or URI of the request
        Returns:
        the actual request path as a String

      • getMethod

        java.lang.String getMethod()
        Returns:
        the HTTP method of this request

      • getBody

        java.lang.String getBody()
        Gets the entire request body as a String. Future versions of this interface will provide methods for reading the body as a stream for improved performance.
        Returns:
        the request body as a UTF-8 string.
